content: After resting at the Windseal Gate Shrine, it’s time to fight the other Vanguard at the **Crouching Tiger Temple**, and we’ll return back to the Yellow Wind Formation area soon enough.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rock Clash Platform'.
The content is as follows:
After resting at the Windseal Gate Shrine, it’s time to fight the other Vanguard at the **Crouching Tiger Temple**, and we’ll return back to the Yellow Wind Formation area soon enough.
